title: John 1:1
text: In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.

title: John 1:2
text: He was with the God in the beginning.

title: John 1:3
text: Through him all things was made; without him nothing was made that has been made.

title: John 1:4
text: In him was life, and that life was the light of all mankind.
